title: The words of the people are written on the Lennon walls,

replies.msg:
The words of the people are written on the Lennon walls,
and Linden walls.

In restless dreams we work like teams,
millions people may be more.

And echoes in the world of freedom.

I turn my wear to the dark and black.

And the mission
that was planted in my brain
Still remains.
